desc:
Post 1717
- Set Color: Not Quite Olive
- When you play this, draw a <:wild:1106237191388143838>, This card also has ⚡
- While this is in a personal status, Whenever you play a <:wild:1106237191388143838>+⚡, convert a card to <:wild:1106237191388143838>
_ _
- For each house bought, draw an additional <:wild:1106237191388143838> with a ⚡
- When a hotel is bought, Move this card to your personal status.
- When a skyscraper is bought, all cards drawn due to this card are **Phantom**
